title: In game settings changed from new patch and i cant fix it
body:
The latest patch reset all my settings in game. I've been trying to fix them but it wont save. I cant fix the settings in game because it will not allow me to change my attack move click to MB1. why is it that I have to change this setting in the settings folder in the league app and not just allow it in the actual game? if anyone knows how I can change my attack move click to MB1 again please help me!
thanks

replies.body:
Unfortunately, I cannot assist you in making this change because it's not in-game, as you mentioned. Since this is a modification outside of the in-game settings, it's something we don't support or can assist with.

Let me know if you have any questions.
